o_O C: I'm encouraging people to take a Maximal character if you 
don't already have one, or maybe take another, because the Maximals 
need more members. (I'll be bringing in a Maxi soon)

The Preds need a mechanic so Switchblade is joining.

|---Megatron---|

Megatron ignores his minions as they proceed to do as ordered. A 
nagging feeling tugs as his mind as he recalls the bots who decided 
to join his team. Of all the bots who showed up, only one hadn't 
made his appearance yet, Switchblade.

As if on queue, two glowing green eyes shift position, and a dark 
green and black, 3.5 foot tall bot strolls in from one of the dimly 
lit corridors. Megatron's eyes narrow as the nonchalant bot makes 
his way towards the Predacon leader. "Switchblade..." says Megatron.

|---Switchblade---|

Switchblade hops over some debri, and lands himself right in from of 
Megatron, only to receive a devastating blow to the upper torso by 
from a irritated Megatron. "I suppose I was asking for that, 'o 
mighty Megstron." He maintains a sarcastic tone, only partially 
masking his respect and fear.

Getting back up, he dusts himself off, and turns to face the 
leader. "So, what needs to be done? I see that the ship was... 
damaged... to say the least in the atmospheric entry. I'm guessing 
that Repairs are necessary..." he sighs almost dejectedly, but perks 
up immediately.

Megatron ignores the smaller bot's antics, "Yes, repairs do need 
doing. Your first task is to help Perceptor fix the scanners, and 
then you can salvage the parts from the engine." 

Switchblade nods. "Alright."

He hops over to Perceptor, and punches the larger bot in the 
knee, "Alright ya heap, what have ya done so far?"
